stopScan().Description: Stops the network scan Use this method to stop an ongoing scan. When user requests a new scan, a @B_android#telephony#NetworkScan_E@ object will be returned, and the user can stop the scan by calling this method.

ClassDesc: The caller of @B_android#telephony#TelephonyManager#requestNetworkScan_E@ will receive an instance of @B_android#telephony#NetworkScan_E@, which contains a callback method @B_android#telephony#NetworkScan#stopScan_E@ for stopping the in-progress scan.
